game.name: Rust
game.genres: Action, Adventure, Indie, Massively Multiplayer, RPG
game.categories: Multi-player, MMO, PvP, Online PvP, Co-op, Online Co-op, Cross-Platform Multiplayer, Steam Achievements, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Workshop, In-App Purchases, Valve Anti-Cheat enabled, Stats, Remote Play on Tablet
game.shortDescription: Rust에서의 목표는 오직 하나, 바로 살아남는 것입니다. 섬의 야생 동물, 다른 주민, 환경, 다른 생존자 모두가 여러분의 목숨을 노립니다. 하루 더 살아남을 수 있다면 수단과 방법을 가리지 마세요.
game.shortDescriptionEn: The only aim in Rust is to survive. Everything wants you to die - the island’s wildlife, other inhabitants, the environment, and other survivors. Do whatever it takes to last another night.

reviewHighlights.text: 8/10 game requires a nasa super computer to run it perfectly. I have mastered all slurs in every language.
You spawn on the beach with a russian kid already chasing you with all his might trying to bash your head in with a rock instead of making progress an...
